group_1.textLeft: Are you okay?

group_1.textRight: Wait, I was eatin', and then...@What the heck happened?

group_1.textLeft: You don't remember?

[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hehe, [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]it was so tasty you passed out!
Felicia went down at the same time@you did! I just couldn't believe it.

group_1.textCenter: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into](Just bein' reminded of it turns my stomach.)
(This girl wouldn't know good food@if it punched her right in the tongue...)

group_1.textLeft: Is something wrong?

group_1.textRight: I don't feel right...@I feel...strangely warm...

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]then it worked!

group_1.textRight: What're you talkin' about...[chara:200601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200601:cheek_1][chara:200601:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:200601:lipSynch_1]@What did you put in my food?!

group_1.textLeft: Nothing, I promise! Take it easy!
I just made a little tweak to your Soul Gem.
[chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whoa!@I feel super light!
Coordinator!@You did this?!
Mmhmm. @I made your magic a little bit stronger.

group_1.textRight: ...Ah, I see... I finally get it.
That's why they call you the Coordinator.@

group_1.textLeft: Right you are.
I'm your friendly neighborhood Coordinator,@ally to Magical Girls everywhere.
I enhance Magical Girls' magic by @making adjustments to their Soul Gems.
Thanks so much for stopping by♪
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Chuckle* It was a little thank-you for@helping me out in the kitchen today.
It takes a while to get used to,@but you'll be way stronger now!

group_1.textRight: Well thanks, Coordinator!@This oughta make Witch huntin' way easier!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]But it doesn't end there!
I'm giving you a limited time only discount,@since I caused you both so much trouble.
You better come back before they expire!

group_1.textRight: This is exactly what I needed!@It'll be a huge help.

group_1.textLeft: Phew. Even so, I can't believe@I screwed up not once, but twice...
Yes.
I tried making some snacks a few days ago,@but that didn't go well, either...

group_1.textRight: Was the last person to come [textRed:Mami Tomoe]?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you know her?

group_1.textRight: Well, I should probably head out now.
But I will definitely be back.

group_1.textLeft: You're welcome anytime you like.@I'll try my hand at another dish!

group_1.textRight: Er, I won't be stoppin' by for any@more of Chef Mitama's specials.

group_1.textLeft: Aw, what a shame.

group_1.textRight: I think I've had enough of Chef@Mitama's cookin' to last a lifetime.

group_1.textLeft: Wait up, Red Head!@I'm gonna head out, too!

group_1.textRight: Augh, I can still taste it...
Yeah… I get the sense that my stomach @is fightin' the battle of its life right now…

group_1.textCenter: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Chuckle*@Looks like I got a new customer!
